name: Forged Adventure
description:
Forged Adventure is a turn-based RPG with an epic fantasy theme. Explore a massive open world, talk with locals, find allies, learn new skills, and fight your foes.



You awake in a shipwreck with no recollection of your life before, only to find that the world you woke up in is on the brink of disastrous war. Learn your place in history as you chase down the evil wizard Ivershoar, and put an end to his wicked intentions.Features
  • Rich and believable open world.
  • Turn-based combat system.
  • Use weapons and spells that you have found during your adventure or purchased from merchants.
  • Teachers will help you become stronger.
  • Solve puzzles to find treasures.
  • Main quest line and lots of side quests.

All non-English translations are made by players. Join our translation project to get a free copy of the game.
